text: Horst Klauck (30 September 1931 – 2004) was a German footballer who played for 1. FC Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2004 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Horst Klauck
